horoscopes.title: Aries Weekly Horoscope Starting November 30
content: The first week of November will witness two planetary events, they are the full moon in the fourth house and Mercury turning direct. The full moon in fourth house will bring a strong pull toward your personal space, and real estate deals. You will discuss domestic issues, you will also plan for relocation, reorganising the living space, address a family concern, and attend some family functions too. The full moon indicates endings, so some issues which were harming your domestic peace will come to an end. A landlord, builder, or a maintenance worker also will come to your home. You will spend more time at home due to family obligations.

The Sun, Mercury and Venus are in the eighth house, and the good news is Mercury is direct, so you will have better cashflow. The previous days were so challenging due to the huge amount of expenses, but from this week onwards, you will feel the difference, and your gains will be slightly more than the expenses. You will deal with joint finances, shared resources or other people’s money, in direct and practical manner. This can also be like paying back some debts, receiving or applying for a loan, or restructuring the tax, insurance or PF policies too. You will also discuss the shared household expenses with the partner, or you will discuss new business plans.

Martian transit through Sagittarius will bring events like travelling, mobility, legal or academic matters. You may go for a long trip, which can be international also as global ventures are the part of this transit. This transit will bring the opportunities to write long form articles, and publish them. You will be interacting a lot with teachers, mentors or gurus, but you will be a bit rebellious too. Learning, and knowledge sharing will be the definite part of this transit.

horoscopes.title: Taurus Weekly Horoscope Starting November 30
content: The full moon in Gemini will be the first event of this week, and that will bring a lot of communication and travel. The full moon indicates completions, so you will complete a project, or you will go for a short trip which you always wanted to go. Your siblings, neighbours, or coworkers may need your help, leading to visits, meetings or exchanging some objects. The Full moon can make you a communicate a lot, and there will be more phone calls, and urgent text messages too. You will enrol a course, could attend local meetings, workshops, or classes where printed materials are distributed.

Mercury has turn direct, and this is certainly the good news, it is with Sun and Venus in the seventh house, so you will be visible in the public domain. There will be events involving partnerships, agreements, and one-to-one interactions. You will schedule meetings with clients, partners or collaborators, sign documents which is legal. All Taurus natives will go for long trips, or attend social gatherings too, and this is a golden opportunity for singles to meet someone special. However, it will be good if you keep a hand distance from someone whom you feel uncomfortable. You will also handle items that belong to another person, or return borrowed things.

The transit Mars through eight houses will bring events involving money, join responsibilities, and systems that operates behind the scenes. Mars itself is the planet for financial liabilities, so there is a red flag, as there are chances for more expenses, so you have to be prepared for that. You will make payment on loans, clear overdue bills, or visit banks to update the accounts, or adjust credit limits. You will also have interactions regarding tax, PF and insurance. There are chances for repairs connected with plumbing, drainage, or hidden systems at home.

horoscopes.title: Gemini Weekly Horoscope Starting November 30
content: This week belongs to you Gemini, Sun, Moon and rising signs, as the full moon will be in your sign, making your more visible. The full moon indicates completions, so you will complete a cycle of some events related to your personal life, and it can also be a relationship. There can be changes regarding your appearance—haircuts, new clothing purchases, skin care routines, or adjustments to your presentation for work or social events. You will also receive some invites, attend gatherings, or appear in a situation where people directly need you. However, there are chances for minor health issues like a headache or a fever, which will be temporary.

The transit Mercury has turned direct, which will be a great relief for your communication issues and technical glitches. These three planets are moving through the sixth house, so you will have more work, and a lot of responsibilities at work. Your schedule will be busier with meetings, assignments, deadlines, or additional duties that need hands-on involvement. There will be some competitive events like team work or interviews. Coworkers will ask for support, but make sure you do your work first, and stay away from any kind of unhealthy discussions with them. You will also take up new health care practices too.

Mars is moving through the seventh house, so your focus will be on others, as the seventh house indicates partnerships, agreements and one to one interaction. You will be showing up for discussions, meetings or planning sessions, or with important individuals. Please avoid stepping into unhealthy debates, as Mars can make you very aggressive. This is not a good time to finalise commitments, sign documents, or move forward with shared plans, so if you want to do so, it is very important to review them carefully. There will be opportunities to attend interviews and other social gatherings too.

horoscopes.title: Cancer Weekly Horoscope Starting November 30
content: The first week of December will be having full moon in the twelfth house, so Cancer natives will be a bit emotional thinking about the past. You will feel like detaching from the public front, and spend some time for yourself in prayer or meditation. You will also find someone from the past, but make sure you don’t share any private information with them. Old files, stored items or delayed work may need sorting, clearing, or completion. This is the time for some transactions regarding confidential matters, and you will have to maintain the secrecy. You will also get some updates from the foreign lands.

Mercury has turned direct, so the technical and communication issues in the past weeks will be over. The Sun, Venus and Mercury are in the fifth house, so there will be increased activity related to creativity, children, entertainment and personal projects. However, please avoid any project which involve huge financial risks. You will attend events, celebrations, games or outings, or help children with their academic work, schedules and extracurricular activities. You will also make plans to enrol in a course, which can be creative in nature. Single natives have the closest opportunities to meet likeminded people too.

Mars is in Sagitarius, and it will be there for few more days, so your work, health and pets will be important for you. Mars is an aggressive planet, so it can bring issues at work, so please stay away from that. There will be team work, and you should coordinate the tasks between your team mates. Health issues may arise, but that will be temporary, so there will be events like taking doctor’s appointments and new health care practices too. You will reorganise your workplace, adopt new pets, or spend time with your pets.

horoscopes.title: Leo Weekly Horoscope Starting November 30
content: Your ruler Moon will be in a full mode, and it will rise in your eleventh house, for Leo natives this will bring some completions at your work or in financial matters. There will be culmination in the long-term projects, and you will finish them and to start new one. The eleventh house also indicates career, so you will complete some projects at work, or you will get updates regarding the interviews. Some of your friends may leave you or you yourself will leave some team ventures. The eleventh house indicates long term goals so you will be trying to set some long-term plans just to make more money.

Mercury has turned direct, so you will better about your conversations, and the technical glitches will be over. The Sun, Venus and Mercury will be moving through the fourth house, so you will rearrange furniture, repair appliances, purchase household items, or you will also think about relocation. Family members will come to you, and you will host small gatherings, or handle shared tasks like paperwork, grocery runs, or helping an elderly member in the family. There are chances for discussion related to selling and buying a property as well. The Sun is not an ideal planet to be in the fourth house, so there will be arguments at home too.

Martian transit through the fifth house will increase the time with children, as they will have some academic or non-academic activity. You will attend some team events, competitions, or travel plans alone or with friends. The fifth house indicates risk taking, and Mars is a reckless planet, so this is not the time in invest in anything which is risky. Single Leo natives will be busy in finding their ideal partner, and they will get some opportunities to meet, but this is not the time to start any new relationships.

horoscopes.title: Virgo Weekly Horoscope Starting November 30
content: This week will start with a powerful full moon in your tenth house of career, reputation and long-term goals. The spotlight is on your professional life, and that will bring completions in some projects as the full moon indicates completions. If you have been working diligently on some projects, now it is the moment when your efforts become visible to the right people. However, the full moon can also stir emotional intensity related to authority figures, work pressure, or public expectations. Be mindful of overcommitting or letting pride push you into unnecessary conflicts. You will also get some updates regarding the old interviews.

The Sun, Venus and Mercury are in your third house, so there will be a lot of communication, learning, and social connections. These planets will bring active engagements in conversations, networking, and sharing ideas. You will be connecting with siblings, neighbours, or peers, as these interactions can lead to creative breakthroughs, or practical solutions. During this week, you will pitch some ideas, write or study those topics, which will enhance your professional or personal skills. Venus is also here, so you can expect good experiences from the public domain, and there will be some opportunities for short and long-distance travel too.

Martian transit through the firth house will add a layer or dynamic energy to your private sphere. Mars itself is the planet for real estate deals and construction; there will be some discussions happening around this theme. You will resolve domestic issues, initiate home projects, or address family dynamics, that have been simmering. Please be cautious about impulsive reactions, so channel Mars energy into constructive action than confrontations. There will be some workload too, as Mars is aspecting the tenth house, and full moon is also there so, you may also undergo work related pressure, but it will be temporary.

horoscopes.title: Libra Weekly Horoscope Starting November 30
content: The full moon will rise in the ninth house of higher learning, travel and philosophy. This is the time for spiritual and philosophical exploration, as the ninth house indicates both. The full moon indicates completions, so you will go for a spiritual or philosophical debate or a pilgrimage which you always longed for. You will also publish your articles, after a long wait too. You will either complete a course or start a new course which you always wanted to do. Long trips, global ventures, and meet up with your foreign friends can also happen during this time. The motherly figures will hold an important role in this week.

Mercury has turned direct, so this will be a relief for you as the communication issues and technical glitches will be over. These planets are moving through the second house, so there will be some discussions regarding practical matters connected to budgeting, investments, or career compensations will take the priority. There will be communication regarding financial arrangements, negotiations, contracts, or sharing your ideas about wealth and resources. Venus will make you spend for luxury items, and on fine dining too. This is a week to focus on what you truly value, cut unnecessary expenses, and invest your energy where it yields lasting returns.

Martian transit through the third house will make you act decisively, in your immediate circles. You will initiate communications; tackle ending tasks or engage in local networking. While Mars gives motivation and drive, be cautious of impatience or heated exchanges, so it’s better to channel this energy into productive debates. You can expect new study programs, short trips, and a lot of online and offline communications. You will try to buy or repair your electronic devices, be active in social media groups, and attend some functions in the neighbouring community.

horoscopes.title: Scorpio Weekly Horoscope Starting November 30
content: For Scorpio Sun, Moon and rising, the full moon will rise in your eighth house, so the financial matters will be very important. The Moon indicates emotions and the full moon means completions, so, some of your emotional traumas will be over during this week. The impact of the full moon will last for the next six months, so you will have a long-term healing process too. The financial matters also will be important, so you pay of some loans, and you will also try to restructure the tax, PF and insurance. This lunation will act like a spotlight on your thought process, revealing both vulnerabilities and sources of personal power.

The Sun, Mercury and Venus are moving through your sign so, this is the last phase of your solar return. You will be trying for some refinement like a new haircut, you will buy a new dress, or you will take up new health care practices too. Others will notice you more easily, and you will be boldly sharing your ideas to new people. Venus will try to add some ease to your problems, and there will be more peace in your life. You will take up new courses, new projects and new relationships and personal and professional domain.

Martian transit is on through the second house, so this is the time to take up some actions about making more money. You will try to get new job, so you can expect new interview calls, so please be prepare for that. The second house indicates earnings, so you will surely get some freelance or part time project too. Mars’ influence can also heighten awareness of your personal values, -what you offer, what you deserve, and wherever you have been underselling yourself. This is also a time for studying new course and update your skills too.

horoscopes.title: Sagittarius Weekly Horoscope Starting November 30
content: The first week of December will have a full moon in the air sign of Gemini, so the seventh house will be active. Matters involving romantic partners, business partners, close friends, or even rivals may reach a moment of clarity or completion. Conversations that were postpones or emotions that were held back rise to the surface no, so you will understand the situations better. The full moon indicates completions, so some relationships will reach a turning point too. You will also attend some social gatherings like parties or business meets too. This full moon also shows you signing some documents, and some partnerships can end as well.

The Sun, Venus and Mercury are moving through the twelfth house, so they will draw you inward, creating a natural desire for solitude, reflection, and emotional processing. Something hidden which can come up during this phase, and you may have to deal with that. This is a good time for going for healing practices too, and it is very much possible as Venus is also here. You may go to visit some people who lives in the isolated places. The sleep will be rich with a lot of dreams, which will signal you about your future.

Martian transit is through your first house, and it is moving through the last degrees of Sagittarius. You will be more assertive, more driven, and more willing to initiate change-both internally and externally. This Mars will surely boost confidence, but can also amplify impatience, so be mind of reacting too quickly or pushing too hard. You will start new routines, asserting boundaries, or you will take control of the situations. This Mars will push you to take some refinement activities like a haircut, or you will buy a new dress, and thus you will try to improve your health.

horoscopes.title: Capricorn Weekly Horoscope Starting November 30
content: This week will begin with a powerful and practical shift as the full moon will rise in your sixth house of work, health, and daily routine. Something in your day-to-day life reaches a turning point-perhaps or a project wraps up, a habit needs adjusting, or a responsibility becomes more clearly defined. This full moon will make you analyse how well your current lifestyle support your long-term goals. You will clean up your workplace, reorganise, or streamline your schedule. This Moon can make you emotional, so make sure you don’t take up any conversation in an emotional manner. You will also spend more time with your pets or adopt a new one.

The Sun, Mercury, and Venus are moving through the eleventh house, so you will have many opportunities to join a new group. These planets will push you to spend more time in community, friendships, networks, and future aspirations will come into focus. There will be fruitful collaborations with likeminded people, and they will give you a lot of ideas. Mercury will bring a lot of group communications in an online or offline mode. You will set up new long-term goals, and team support will be very important for this, so make sure you have a good bond between your friends.

Mars is moving through Sagittarius, and this will impact your emotional self. This transit will bring hidden frustrations, subconscious fears, or old patterns will come into the surface. You will complete a cycle of inner work before Mars enters your sign later this month. For now, Mars is asking for quiet strength; rest when needed, protect your energy, and be mindful or burnout. You will take up secret projects, finish some tasks, or letting go of emotional burdens which were draining you for a long time. You will have a spiritual inclination, and you will also meet someone from the past.

horoscopes.title: Aquarius Weekly Horoscope Starting November 30
content: The first cosmic event of this month will be the full moon in Gemini, which rules your fifth house of creativity and self-expression. Something your care deeply about will reach a culmination point. It can be a creative project, romantic relationship, or even a personal desire. The full moon indicates completions, so you will complete some projects with your creative projects or for your children. You will also spend some time in enjoying with your team members, or with youngsters. This Moon, also will push you for self-promotional activities, and you will get public attention. Since the full moon indicates ending, a romantic relationship can also end.

The Sun, Venus and Mercury are moving through your tenth house, so your career will be very important. Since three planets are there, so you will have multiple tasks, and you will be busy throughout this week. Your presence at work will be visible than ever before. Those who work in admin, politics, beauty, business, communications and media will be busy, and they will get new opportunities. You will have better impact on your clients, but you should be patient while listening to them. Managers and other authority figures will have very important conversations with you.

Martian impact on Sagittarius will make you take some action about friendships, community and network circles. You will be more assertive, or bold about connecting with groups, advocating for your goals, or initiating collaborative projects. You will find soe support, join forces with others, or take steps towards long term dreams that require team work. However, Mars can make you a bit emotional, and there are chances for ego clashes. Please try to have a good bond with your team members as whatever gains you have, it will come through your friends as well. There will be social gatherings and online or offline meetings as well.

horoscopes.title: Pisces Weekly Horoscope Starting November 30
content: The weekly horoscope shows deep emotional and grounding tone as the full moon will be rising in your fourth house. Something connected to your living situation, family dynamics, or emotional security will reach a completion or clarity. You will spend more time with your family members especially with your elderly family members. This Moon will solve some of the family issues which was haunting you for a long time. This lunation will push you to release old emotional patterns, finalise home related decisions, or confront a matter that has been silently beneath the surface. You will have some real estate deals, renovation or you will think about relocation as well.

The Sun, Mercury and Venus are in your ninth house, so you will be trying to be adventurous. You will try to learn new courses and thus update your skills. Reading, writing and publishing your articles can also come up as the part of this transit. You will enrol a course, and appear for some exam, or you will prepare for back papers. The ninth house indicates foreign travel a collaboration, so you will try to go for a long trip, or you will try to get a new contract from the foreign lands. Prayer, meditation and spiritual discussions also will be the part of this transit.

The transit Mars is moving through the tenth house, as it is moving through the fire sign of Sagittarius. You will be trying to prove your career skills, and you will be a bit aggressive for that. Please try to keep a good vibe between your colleagues, otherwise there will be clashes. Those who work in sports, admin and armed forces will have new opportunities. Pisces job seekers will have the closest opportunities to get a new job as well. There will be a lot of workloads, but you will be able to complete them.
